text:
Pt  is a 74 yo man with multiple medical problems  who was initially
   admitted on [**12-9**] with MS changes, nausea and vomitting.  Was admitted
   to the MICU  with sepsis and sent out to CC7.  Pt has had ongoing
   hypothermia throughout admission.  He had a +RPR which is suggestive
   for syphyllis.  On [**12-19**], he had a hypoglycemic event with BS to 38
   treated with D5o, rsp well Then he went to IR for PICC line and LP to
   r/o neurosyphyllis.  Only a midline was able to be placed.  Pt prone
   during LP, then PEA arrested.  Rec'd 1 round of CPR and meds, intubated
   and transferred to MICU for further care. Pt was hypotensive initially
   ond was on pressors which was weaned off, successfully extubated on
   [**11-20**]. pt contd to have tenous resp status and  had another episode of
   mucus plug in the icu,pt was called out and sent to the floor on [**11-23**].
   On [**11-24**] overnight pt triggered for resp distress and desaturation to
   60
s with questionable pleth(unable to get good pleth),received 60mg iv
   Lasix(didn
t putout  anything,anuric),and transferred to micu for
   further care.
   Pneumonia, other
   Assessment:
   Received pt  RR 10-30 Irreg pattern with Periods of apnea, Sats 94-100%
   O2 FT 35%. Lungs Rhonchi dim bases, weak congested cough subglottal sx
   for sm amts thick  blood tinge secretions.  Congested cough unable to
   expectorate secretions.   NTx x2 for moderate amount secretion .
   hypothermic WBC 9.9
   Action:
    Suctions  NT x2
   Resp rate irreg, has [**Last Name (un) **]-[**Doctor Last Name **] pattern, periods of apnea  followed
   by periods of tachypnea  maintains sats.  Chest PT q4hrs PT eval and
   Pulm toilet , cont on bear hugger
   Response:
   Poor cough with decreased MS , temp96.6, morning temp 99.3, take off
   bear hugger
   Plan:
   Pulmonary toilet
   f/u results sputum cx
   Need SW consult for family
   Alteration in Nutrition
   Assessment:
   Cont   TF .  Abd soift nontender palpation peg inplace.  Flexiseal dr
   [**Last Name (STitle) **] amt liq brown stool.
   Action:
   Rectal flexiseal cath draining brown liquid stool  + Guiac stool ,
   indigestion food no bloody secretion form PEG and NGT. NGT d/ced
   Response:
   Tol TF , increased to 40cc/hr
   Plan:
   Resume TF adv as tol to goal.
   Free H20 per parameters.
   Renal failure, End stage (End stage renal disease, ESRD)
   Assessment:
   Anuric
   Action:
   Pt with foley cath in place, no u/o
   Left arm with fistula noted to have (+)3 edema, team notified
   Response:
   Anuric on HD
   Plan:
   HD as directed Tues/thru/Sat
   Gastrointestinal bleed, other (GI Bleed, GIB)
   Assessment:
   Received pt with NGT draining indigestion food no bloody secrtion cont
   hugger.  , HCt checked, start on protonix Iv BID
   Action:
   cont   TF
   Response:
   HCT in pm 30, morning HCt 28.9
   Plan:
   Monitor for GIB
   Plan EGD if rebleeds. Follow seriel Hct
   Ineffective Coping
   Assessment:
   Family @ bedside all shift. Family expressed concern with difficulty
   understanding the complication of pt recovery.
   Action:
   Met with MICU team to discuss Goals of care.
   Response:
   Family need support  to cope with pts grave state.
   Plan:
   [**12-27**] Palliative care  consult
